Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.stateController

Class StateContainer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.stateController.StateContainer
public class StateContainer extends Object
A StateContainer is an object which holds the application's state, which can be acquired or updated through the apposite StateContainer supplied methods.
See Also:

    • updateState

      public void updateState(Message message)
      UpdateState is the method which handles the state update requests. The new state will be calculated based on the message payload through the appropriate Reducer. The updated attributes of the state will be notified to the listeners.
      Parameters:
      message - Message object containing the payload.

    • addPropertyChangeListener

      public void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Add listeners for ClientState updates
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be added
